mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a black and white photograph, taken outdoors, of two small children sitting on a blanket on the lawn. There is a man sitting in a lawn chair behind them. The handwritten note on the back identifies the picture as Father, Harry, Dawn, 1957. The accompanying notes identify the subjects as Clarence M. Wood (sitting), Dawn Alexis Wood, and Harry Hanley Wood.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Clarence M. Wood, Dawn Alexis Wood, and Harry Hanley Wood (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Staton, Dawn Alexis Wood
Wood, Harry Hanley
Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby)
